Fulfillment of Non-Negotiable Criteria.description: The candidate’s only Java experience dates back to 2016–2018, mainly involving servlets and mobile services, with no evidence of Spring Boot, Maven/Gradle, or multithreading expertise. Key fundamentals like Java frameworks and modern build tools are missing.

Fulfillment of Negotiable Criteria.description: Some exposure to cloud via Firebase, lightweight messaging with socket.io, and Node.js back ends suggests general backend familiarity, but there is no containerization, Kafka/RabbitMQ, or cloud provider (AWS/Azure/GCP) experience.

Continuity and Recency of Experience.description: Java work ended in mid-2018, and since then the candidate has focused exclusively on iOS/macOS apps in Swift/Objective-C, indicating a significant gap in maintaining Java-related skills and practices.
